title: Kudos to Riot's Art Department for Making the new Trundle Splash Arts

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I bought the Trundle Bundle just to look at the splashes. Good job Riot. 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Trundle support here. Kinda sad to see the old derpy splashes go but holy crap yeah these new ones just make you feel epic.
The only one I am super mad/upset/sad about is Traditional Trundle :(   I got that skin because of Poop.  It literally was Poop.  And I loved it.
